list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Changes (made because of recommendations of classmate (benni)):
FelixFrame: getLightMode implemented setGradientColor implemented Button animation for close and minimize
FelixButton: setOpacity affects image in Button as well setColor implemented for none Gradient color setImage arg type from BufferedImage to java.awt.Image

task.summary: Default task
Initial commit
Initial commit
Initial commit
Commit, but CustomInputField.java doesnt work.

Bug fix: Displaying CustomInputField.java finally worked again:
Bug was: getHeight() and getWidth() methods return 0 before the element is being painted on a Frame. Solution: implemented custom variables and replaced method calls with getting arguments

Bug fix: Displaying CustomInputField.java finally worked again:
Bug was: getHeight() and getWidth() methods return 0 before the element is being painted on a Frame. Solution: implemented custom variables and replaced method calls with getting arguments

Add functionality: Added Opacity change option to CustomButton.java and CustomPanel.java
before painting, sets opacity to current level standard opacity is 1.0f (float type)

Add functionality: Added Opacity change option to CustomButton.java and CustomPanel.java
before painting, sets opacity to current level standard opacity is 1.0f (float type)

unnecessary changes:
Changed CustomTextPane's parent from JEditorPane to JTextPane
Binary files got changed too, i dont know why
Initial Commit

Add functionality: Added Animation for highlighting text in CustomTextPane on mouse hovering
by setting the whole textes alpha to 60% on mouse enter and the lines, which the cursor is on, back to 100% on mouse exit everything gets set back to 100%

Add functionality: Added Animation for hovering over CustomTextPane -> it gets bigger on mouse enter and back to normal size on mouse exit
exactly the same as CustomButtons implementation
Refactoring: Renamed from Custom... to Felix... copied everything into a package com.CustomSwing.
Refactoring: Renamed from Custom... to Felix... copied everything into a package com.CustomSwing.
Add files: README.md TODO.txt

Initial Commit:
Honestly, I have no Idea why there are so many files changed but since now, everything is correct I will just commit it once and try to explain what has happened: I refactored everything into a package, I tried creating the FelixScrollPane and I added the scrollPane instead of the default JTextPane to the Scene, so I can see the effects.
I directly add the CustomTitleBar into the FelixFrame class, since its never else needed so that should workout.

unnecessary changes:
Changed pictures names to more understandable and replaced the old paths to the images with the new ones

unnecessary changes:
Refactored the TODO.txt file and added ideas

unnecessary changes:
Added Test.java to .gitignore
Add functionality: Added Option to change radius and Opacity to FelixInputField and FelixTextPane

FIX
There was a problem with git, i will just commit now, hope everything works and after next commit, everything should work again

FIX
There was a problem with git, I think i got everything to work again

unnecessary changes:
Added Test.java to .gitignore
Add functionality: Changed options for animating FelixTextPane
unnecessary changes: Resorted FelixInputField constructors
Add functionality: Added Constructor options to FelixButton for creating without String
Removed FelixScrollPane for clean up, will push after this commit and then add FelixScrollPane again
Initialising I reordered everything into src, Examples, and pics for README.md into pics. Updated README.md to display images
Remove Later

MESSAGE.value: Commit, but CustomInputField.java doesnt work.

Bug fix: Displaying CustomInputField.java finally worked again:
Bug was: getHeight() and getWidth() methods return 0 before the element is being painted on a Frame. Solution: implemented custom variables and replaced method calls with getting arguments

Bug fix: Randomly reordering of Scene elements on Hover over CustomInputField.java
Bug was: setPreferredSize() was called which, since overwritten in class, changes parameters Solution: call super.setPreferredSize() which directly sets size instead of additionally changing Parameters

Add functionality: Added Opacity change option to CustomButton.java and CustomPanel.java
before painting, sets opacity to current level standard opacity is 1.0f (float type)

unnecessary changes:
Changed CustomTextPane's parent from JEditorPane to JTextPane
Binary files got changed too, i dont know why
Initial Commit

Add functionality: Added Animation for highlighting text in CustomTextPane on mouse hovering
by setting the whole textes alpha to 60% on mouse enter and the lines, which the cursor is on, back to 100% on mouse exit everything gets set back to 100%

Add functionality: Added Animation for hovering over CustomTextPane -> it gets bigger on mouse enter and back to normal size on mouse exit
exactly the same as CustomButtons implementation
Refactoring: Renamed from Custom... to Felix... copied everything into a package com.CustomSwing.
Add files: README.md TODO.txt

Initial Commit:
Honestly, I have no Idea why there are so many files changed but since now, everything is correct I will just commit it once and try to explain what has happened: I refactored everything into a package, I tried creating the FelixScrollPane and I added the scrollPane instead of the default JTextPane to the Scene, so I can see the effects.
I directly add the CustomTitleBar into the FelixFrame class, since its never else needed so that should workout.

unnecessary changes:
Changed pictures names to more understandable and replaced the old paths to the images with the new ones

unnecessary changes:
Refactored the TODO.txt file and added ideas
Add functionality: Added Option to change radius and Opacity to FelixInputField and FelixTextPane

FIX
There was a problem with git, I think i got everything to work again
